text: Beer and Loathing is the tenth studio album by Canadian celtic punk band The Real McKenzies. It was released on July 3, 2020 under Fat Wreck Chords in the United States and Stomp Records in Canada. ==Single== The first single to be released, which is named after the album, was release on July 2, 2020. The second "Big Foot Steps" was released on May 31, 2020. ==Background== At the time of writing music for the album, the band were on a world tour, which ended up being postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2020 albums Category:The Real McKenzies albums Category:Fat Wreck Chords albums
title: Beer and Loathing
